node_modules/emmetio-codemirror-plugin-webextensions/dist/emmet-codemirror-plugin.js

Note: Removed "sourceMappingURL"

$ uglifyjs <source> --compress sequences=false --beautify beautify=false,semicolons=false,comments=some --output <destination>

Where:
    uglifyjs = npm install -g uglify-js@^3.10.4
    <source> = File node_modules/emmetio-codemirror-plugin-webextensions/dist/emmet-codemirror-plugin.js
    <destination> = File ./emmet-codemirror-plugin.js
